entry.title: files must be dragged in
entry.content: as another reviewer said, you can’t access your images, you have to go outside and drag them in. Also, the feedback doesn’t work as another reviewer mentioned, the captcha is always wrong. There is no way to remove the image after working on it. You have to open a new image. There is a popup that wants you to buy Fotor Pro, but there is no such thing. Not sure if this company even exists.

entry.title: Unusable
entry.content: I could find no way to access my photos while in this app. Three options are provided, none worked for me. I attempted to reach support but my request was repeatedly refused because it claimed I had improperly typed the code. I made multiple attempts and I am certain I was typing the code correctly. I suspect it was set up to discourage requests for support.

Unusable

I could find no way to access my photos while in this app. Three options are provided, none worked for me. I attempted to reach support but my request was repeatedly refused because it claimed I had improperly typed the code. I made multiple attempts and I am certain I was typing the code correctly. I suspect it was set up to discourage requests for support.

entry.title: Does not retouch - has lots of enhancements, but won’t fix a blemish
entry.content: This app has lots of great lighting, and will turn something black and white, borders, etc. But it won’t let you fix a blemish which is key.

entry.title: Used to love it
entry.content: I loved this app, but there have been some recent updates and now I am unable to save any photo I edit. It’s not worth using now if I can’t save any photo that I edit. I used it all the time before and it was one of my favorite apps. Really disappointed.

Used to love it

I loved this app, but there have been some recent updates and now I am unable to save any photo I edit. It’s not worth using now if I can’t save any photo that I edit. I used it all the time before and it was one of my favorite apps. Really disappointed.

entry.title: KEEPS CRASHING
entry.content: I use to LOVE this app! But now it keeps crashing! Please fix!!

KEEPS CRASHING

I use to LOVE this app! But now it keeps crashing! Please fix!!

entry.title: Terrible
entry.content: This app used to be great, but the recent updates have made it infuriating and basically useless. Used to be able to drag and drop images from a folder into the app, albeit one at a time, which was silly but it worked. That feature has been removed. Each time you open a new image in Edit mode, the menu resets back to the beginning and you have to navigate to where you were. There is no way to store the prefered folder for saving images. Each time you open the app, the folder setting is cleared and has to be reset. When switching from Collage to Edit, the folder setting is also cleared. For the love of god Fotor, just make a permanent setting for this! And recently, the worst possible thing… every 3rd image edited or created, when you click on the browse button to select the folder that wasn’t saved the last time you selected it, the app freezes and stops responding. The only option then is to force quit, relaunch, reset all your settings, and start again. Seriously Fotor, get it together and hire some qualified people design your app and make it work. This isn’t rocket science.

Terrible

This app used to be great, but the recent updates have made it infuriating and basically useless. Used to be able to drag and drop images from a folder into the app, albeit one at a time, which was silly but it worked. That feature has been removed. Each time you open a new image in Edit mode, the menu resets back to the beginning and you have to navigate to where you were. There is no way to store the prefered folder for saving images. Each time you open the app, the folder setting is cleared and has to be reset. When switching from Collage to Edit, the folder setting is also cleared. For the love of god Fotor, just make a permanent setting for this! And recently, the worst possible thing… every 3rd image edited or created, when you click on the browse button to select the folder that wasn’t saved the last time you selected it, the app freezes and stops responding. The only option then is to force quit, relaunch, reset all your settings, and start again. Seriously Fotor, get it together and hire some qualified people design your app and make it work. This isn’t rocket science.

entry.title: Fix Simple Borders
entry.content: Could you please change the simple borders back to the way they were? The curved border one called “Jet White” is wider than it used to be. I’ve been using Fotor to do simple borders for images on a website. The new format doesn’t match the old format.

Fix Simple Borders

Could you please change the simple borders back to the way they were? The curved border one called “Jet White” is wider than it used to be. I’ve been using Fotor to do simple borders for images on a website. The new format doesn’t match the old format.

entry.title: Beachballing when trying to save
entry.content: I liked this app until recently. I have to force quit the app due to beachballing on my Mac when I try to save an edited picture. Also it is difficult and slow to load a photo from my files. When I finish with one picture, i have to get out of the app to load another picture to edit. That was a month or so ago. Now, I don’t use it due to the beach balling. It’s not my comuputer, it’s the app with a bad bug in it. Please fix it.

Beachballing when trying to save

I liked this app until recently. I have to force quit the app due to beachballing on my Mac when I try to save an edited picture. Also it is difficult and slow to load a photo from my files. When I finish with one picture, i have to get out of the app to load another picture to edit. That was a month or so ago. Now, I don’t use it due to the beach balling. It’s not my comuputer, it’s the app with a bad bug in it. Please fix it.

entry.title: From fantastic to BAD!!!!
entry.content: I’ve always loved this app, until the recent update to 3.1.0. I can no longer add text, because the point size of the text keeps defaulting to 144, or 288 point, and won’t let me select a smaller point size. The “enter text here” box with either of these two very large point sizes, shows up on the app and any attempt to select a lower point size results in the “add text here” box to close, and leave the screen. I sent an email to the company explaining the problem, but they just said they’d pass it on to the techs. This was several weeks ago, and still nothing! I’m wondering if anyone else has this problem, or if I am the only one????

From fantastic to BAD!!!!

I’ve always loved this app, until the recent update to 3.1.0. I can no longer add text, because the point size of the text keeps defaulting to 144, or 288 point, and won’t let me select a smaller point size. The “enter text here” box with either of these two very large point sizes, shows up on the app and any attempt to select a lower point size results in the “add text here” box to close, and leave the screen. I sent an email to the company explaining the problem, but they just said they’d pass it on to the techs. This was several weeks ago, and still nothing! I’m wondering if anyone else has this problem, or if I am the only one????

entry.title: Editing Great, App HORRIBLE
entry.content: Every time I open one pic, start my edits, then it freezes. My cursor spins and I can’t shut the app off, I have to go to my activity monitor and close it out because “Not Responding”. This has happened now, on every picture and I have tried 5 times now. Even when I try to crop and then click “done”, it resets my frame and I can’t get the crop back so I have to close that picture out and re-open without saving my edits. I am so frustrated with this app, DON’T waste your money on this one.

Editing Great, App HORRIBLE

Every time I open one pic, start my edits, then it freezes. My cursor spins and I can’t shut the app off, I have to go to my activity monitor and close it out because “Not Responding”. This has happened now, on every picture and I have tried 5 times now. Even when I try to crop and then click “done”, it resets my frame and I can’t get the crop back so I have to close that picture out and re-open without saving my edits. I am so frustrated with this app, DON’T waste your money on this one.

entry.title: The folks are correct it’s not worth even free
entry.content: I thought it would be good top try this app because of the features it showed and had some positive remarks. However evryone that mentioned bringing in multiple files isn’t possible. You can’t compress or resize the picture to accomadate download restrictions for certain sites. It was on my Mac for 10 minutes and right back off. I wouldn’t keep it even being free.And what’s even more distrurbing is I didn’t see any replies from the developer regarding these same issues over and over that got others like myself to uninstall it.

entry.title: Better Off With Something Else
entry.content: This app is pretty difficult to use. It’s nearly impossible to upload photos to the app unless they are on the desktop or still on the memory card. Once you finally get to upload the photo(s), there are many options available to edit them. This part isn’t that bad, but I still prefer the options of Instagram more than this app. When you’re finished making edits and are ready to save, the app crashes about 50% of the time. I’ve tried to use this app for two weeks, and I’m over it.

Better Off With Something Else

This app is pretty difficult to use. It’s nearly impossible to upload photos to the app unless they are on the desktop or still on the memory card. Once you finally get to upload the photo(s), there are many options available to edit them. This part isn’t that bad, but I still prefer the options of Instagram more than this app. When you’re finished making edits and are ready to save, the app crashes about 50% of the time. I’ve tried to use this app for two weeks, and I’m over it.

entry.title: It was marginal at best…now it just keeps crashing.
entry.content: I found myself using this app sparingly when I wanted to create a quick collage using the templates. Now it just keeps crashing when I try to export a photo. After three attempts and three ‘Force Quits’ I’m done. Deleting this app.

It was marginal at best…now it just keeps crashing.

I found myself using this app sparingly when I wanted to create a quick collage using the templates. Now it just keeps crashing when I try to export a photo. After three attempts and three ‘Force Quits’ I’m done. Deleting this app.

entry.title: not bad
entry.content: a good free app that has the main functions for a photo editing

not bad

a good free app that has the main functions for a photo editing

entry.title: I love this app!
entry.content: I’m a food blogger and use this app for creating Pinterest diptychs. So, my opinion may be less useful because I’m not using its Edit or Design functions and I’m using just a handful of commands in the Collage function. I also don’t change the photos, unless it might be to zoom in on the food. But after the complexity and clutter of Lightroom, I find Fotor refreshingly simple and direct. I have my diptychs created and posted to Pinterest in minutes. It’s an enormous convenience to my workflow and I highly recommend it. I downloaded the app, so I don’t have much experience with the online interface, but I’ve seen it and it looks similar to the app, which is pretty easy to figure out and to use. Keep in mind, that this app is FREE! It’s an outstanding value for the price.

I love this app!

I’m a food blogger and use this app for creating Pinterest diptychs. So, my opinion may be less useful because I’m not using its Edit or Design functions and I’m using just a handful of commands in the Collage function. I also don’t change the photos, unless it might be to zoom in on the food. But after the complexity and clutter of Lightroom, I find Fotor refreshingly simple and direct. I have my diptychs created and posted to Pinterest in minutes. It’s an enormous convenience to my workflow and I highly recommend it. I downloaded the app, so I don’t have much experience with the online interface, but I’ve seen it and it looks similar to the app, which is pretty easy to figure out and to use. Keep in mind, that this app is FREE! It’s an outstanding value for the price.

entry.title: simple reason for a 1 star review
entry.content: You cannot select an image from folder explorer to edit it or apply an effect.

simple reason for a 1 star review

You cannot select an image from folder explorer to edit it or apply an effect.

entry.title: Clunky
entry.content: Sorry, this is too clunky. There isn’t a way to open a queue of files to crop quickly. One must open each file individually, then save each file and choose its destination. No thanks. Why not just open 10 files at once and allow me to crop and then save by overwriting the original file??

Clunky

Sorry, this is too clunky. There isn’t a way to open a queue of files to crop quickly. One must open each file individually, then save each file and choose its destination. No thanks. Why not just open 10 files at once and allow me to crop and then save by overwriting the original file??

entry.title: Amazing, Easy App!!!
entry.content: The smooth functionality of this app makes it one of the best editing apps i have ever used, although i dont edit pictures much. You can simply queue up some pics you might use and allow the app to custom fit them into whichever collage frame you like. It’s that easy!!!

Amazing, Easy App!!!

The smooth functionality of this app makes it one of the best editing apps i have ever used, although i dont edit pictures much. You can simply queue up some pics you might use and allow the app to custom fit them into whichever collage frame you like. It’s that easy!!!

entry.title: Won’t Close Out
entry.content: Fotor has always been such a helpful app for me considering I mainly only need to crop, tilt, and adjust the coloring on photos. Recently, though, I was changing a picture from color to black and white then saving it when fotor froze up on me. It wouldn’t let me click anything on the app and wouldn’t let me close out. I tried quitting (Command+Q) but nothing happened. I can only minimize it.

Won’t Close Out

Fotor has always been such a helpful app for me considering I mainly only need to crop, tilt, and adjust the coloring on photos. Recently, though, I was changing a picture from color to black and white then saving it when fotor froze up on me. It wouldn’t let me click anything on the app and wouldn’t let me close out. I tried quitting (Command+Q) but nothing happened. I can only minimize it.

entry.title: What?
entry.content: Ok I’m spoiled by all the other programs which do so much more.. can’t say it doesn’t work, it’s just boring. Nothing new here folks, just a basic filter program without much control. Like I said, boring.

What?

Ok I’m spoiled by all the other programs which do so much more.. can’t say it doesn’t work, it’s just boring. Nothing new here folks, just a basic filter program without much control. Like I said, boring.

entry.title: Very little control over your photos.
entry.content: Needed an application to help me design a collage, but this app left me unsatisified with very little options to adjust, crop, and otherwise alter my photos. Plus, in the collage section, when you upload a photo, the app adds an annoying border on the uploaded photo. If you want a very basic editor/designer, this is for you, but not advanced enough for my needs.

Very little control over your photos.

Needed an application to help me design a collage, but this app left me unsatisified with very little options to adjust, crop, and otherwise alter my photos. Plus, in the collage section, when you upload a photo, the app adds an annoying border on the uploaded photo. If you want a very basic editor/designer, this is for you, but not advanced enough for my needs.

entry.title: Text - and support - is a Ludicrous Joke
entry.content:
All I want to do is put a line of text on a pic. Text always comes in vertical and extending way off the screen - so big there’s no way to resize it.
They have a form on their site to message support - but the captcha always fails.
They should pay me for wasting my time.

Text - and support - is a Ludicrous Joke

All I want to do is put a line of text on a pic. Text always comes in vertical and extending way off the screen - so big there’s no way to resize it.

They have a form on their site to message support - but the captcha always fails.

They should pay me for wasting my time.

entry.title: Amazing
entry.content: This app works incredibly well, especially the autocorrection. I use it in conjunction with DigiKam (metadata edit and Restoration tool), and the combo is just perfect. Saves me loads of time. I would love to give it 5 stars, but since it doesn’t write/edit metadata to the file like most professional editors, 4 stars seems fair. I would give it 4.5 if I could though.

Amazing

This app works incredibly well, especially the autocorrection. I use it in conjunction with DigiKam (metadata edit and Restoration tool), and the combo is just perfect. Saves me loads of time. I would love to give it 5 stars, but since it doesn’t write/edit metadata to the file like most professional editors, 4 stars seems fair. I would give it 4.5 if I could though.

entry.title: Quick menu board
entry.content: This app was very easy to use and very user friendly. I had to edit my pictures for my menu board it did the bulk of the heavy lifting. Great app with great features. Thanks guys.

Quick menu board

This app was very easy to use and very user friendly. I had to edit my pictures for my menu board it did the bulk of the heavy lifting. Great app with great features. Thanks guys.

entry.title: Perfect Application for Sharing Photos via email
entry.content: Quick and easy way to send out photos via email ….. Just drop pictures into frame and save and drop into your email and off it goes ….. Been using for years, highly recommend!

Perfect Application for Sharing Photos via email

Quick and easy way to send out photos via email ….. Just drop pictures into frame and save and drop into your email and off it goes ….. Been using for years, highly recommend!

entry.title: PNG Problems
entry.content: It worked fine for awhile, but not with PNG Transparent backgrounds that I upload - look like jpg’s when I export. I make sure I check PNG in the settings, too. Otherwise, I would of gave it five stars.

PNG Problems

It worked fine for awhile, but not with PNG Transparent backgrounds that I upload - look like jpg’s when I export. I make sure I check PNG in the settings, too. Otherwise, I would of gave it five stars.

entry.title: i loved it!
entry.content: ITS A VERY GOOD APP TO EDIT YOUR PHOTOS. FREE AND IT WORKS PERFECTLY FINE , THE OPTIONS TO EDIT ARE VERY NICE … IVE BEEN USING IT FOR ALMOST A MONTH , AND IM PRETTY SATISFIED .

i loved it!

entry.title: Solid Photo App
entry.content:
This is still a great app, but it’s missing a few things I use regularly. Although there is rotational capacity, there is no ability to flip or mirror an image. Sometimes I’ll get a photo that has been mirrored or it’s backwards and I want the ability to correct it. This bit is as of yet missing from Fotor.
The rest of the app is truely great and very useful. I color correct, crop and red-eye correct lots of my new and old photos with it.
Honestly, this is my quick-fix go-to app for fixing photos.

Solid Photo App

This is still a great app, but it’s missing a few things I use regularly. Although there is rotational capacity, there is no ability to flip or mirror an image. Sometimes I’ll get a photo that has been mirrored or it’s backwards and I want the ability to correct it. This bit is as of yet missing from Fotor.

The rest of the app is truely great and very useful. I color correct, crop and red-eye correct lots of my new and old photos with it.

Honestly, this is my quick-fix go-to app for fixing photos.

entry.title: Good App
entry.content: It’s the easiest photo restoration program I’ve used. However, when I save the initial picture,, I have to search for the file to save it. It would be much easier to go directly to the last file used.

Good App

entry.title: Wasted my time...
entry.content: Bought the app quite a while ago, never really used it. Two days ago, I decided to use it to pare down a lot of photos into collages to print. The first day all was fine. The second day after a couple of hours, every time I started to upload photos to it, the app would quit. I would click on the photos I wanted to upload and when I clicked ‘open’ and they started uploading to the app, the app would quit. Really really frustrating. I have part of my project done and can’t go any farther because of the app quitting repeatedly!

Wasted my time...

Bought the app quite a while ago, never really used it. Two days ago, I decided to use it to pare down a lot of photos into collages to print. The first day all was fine. The second day after a couple of hours, every time I started to upload photos to it, the app would quit. I would click on the photos I wanted to upload and when I clicked ‘open’ and they started uploading to the app, the app would quit. Really really frustrating. I have part of my project done and can’t go any farther because of the app quitting repeatedly!

If you want to use an app with ease of use this is NOT for you. This app is FILLED WITH BUGS. I am constantly having to close the entire app and LOSE ALL MY WORK to start over because a bug or error will arise making it IMPOSSIBLE to move forward with the project without restarting EVERYTHING.
Your app is a JOKE.

entry.title: Good for a free photo editing app
entry.content: What first attracted me to this app was the price (it’s free), although there is fairly limited capability as to what you can do on this app. You can do so much more on the website fotor.com. Why didn’t they add everything available on the website to the application? I had to put my photos into the website, make my edits, then save it and edit it further in the app. MAKE IT ALL IN ONE PLEASE!! But it is a lovely application to use, glad I found it!

Good for a free photo editing app

Why didn’t they add everything available on the website to the application? I had to put my photos into the website, make my edits, then save it and edit it further in the app. MAKE IT ALL IN ONE PLEASE!! But it is a lovely application to use, glad I found it!

entry.title: Won’t Save My Photos
entry.content: Hello, I love Fotor! I usually use it to edit the photos on my blog…but as of late I can’t save any photos! Please fix!

Won’t Save My Photos

Hello, I love Fotor! I usually use it to edit the photos on my blog…but as of late I can’t save any photos! Please fix!
